blogTexto1: We believe that self-care is the key to a full and happy mental life. Therefore, on our platform, you can find a blog section dedicated to helping you on this journey of self-knowledge and well-being.
blogTexto2: Our mission is to offer a welcoming and informative space, where you can find the support you need to take care of your mental health and build a lighter, happier and fuller life.

funcionalidadesTexto1: Explore a new dimension of brain care with our mental exercises tab dedicated to preventing dementia. With a series of scientifically designed cognitive challenges, we offer an engaging and stimulating way to keep your mind sharp and healthy. From memory games to challenging puzzles, our intuitive platform offers a holistic approach to strengthening your cognitive skills, allowing you to make the most of every moment of lucidity.
\nfuncionalidadesTexto2: “Relaxation” includes guided mindfulness sessions, meditation, and breathing techniques to help users reduce stress and anxiety. Find tranquility and well-being wherever you are with our relaxation and guided meditation tab. With a variety of meditative practices tailored to your needs, from stress reduction to improving sleep, we offer a personalized journey to mental balance. Our intuitive platform allows you to explore a library of expert-guided audio and videos, providing moments of serenity and self-connection amid the chaos of everyday life.
\nfuncionalidadesTexto3: Discover a new approach to emotional self-care with our psychologist integration tab. With an intuitive and secure interface, we connect you to a network of psychologists at a social price, ready to help you face emotional challenges wherever you are. We offer flexible, convenient support to meet your needs, ensuring you can prioritize your mental health affordably and without hassle.
sobreNosTexto1: We are a dedicated team committed to providing mental health care services that promote holistic well-being and emotional balance. Combining clinical expertise and compassion, we are here to support individuals on their journey to a healthier, more meaningful life.
sobreNosTexto2: CalmoMilla aims to have a significant impact on society: we want to expand access to mental health services and reduce the stigma of the topic, making people feel more encouraged to take care of themselves. CalmoMilla came to change lives, bringing a general improvement in people's quality of life.
sobreNosTexto3: The palette was decided based on photos of flower fields, especially chamomile, a plant with calming and relaxing properties, with the aim of providing users with a feeling of welcome, security and relaxation.
\nsobreNosTexto4: The name CalmoMilla was chosen with the aim of conveying tranquility, through the pun between the word “chamomile” and the word “calm”, referencing the brand’s representative: Milla.
\nsobreNosTexto5: Milla's design aims to evoke feelings of hope, acceptance and empathy. Because of this we decided to represent her as a child.
